publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Nahum 1

l.foreign: מַשָא נִינְוֵה סֵפֶר חֲזוֹן נַחוּם הָאֶלְקֹשִי

ab.l: Navilik Nińev́e üč́uń navilik bitigi Naḥumnun ol ʾĖĺqošlunun.
Ḱuńuĺav́č́u T́eńri da öč́ aluvču H öč́ aladyr Jehova dušmanlaryndan da qaḥyr jesisi öč́ aladyr H tar b́eŕuv́č́uĺarińd́ań da t́ek tutadyr ol dušmanlaryna.
H uzaḥ ačuvlu da ullu quvatly da boš qojma boš qojmejdyr H-nyn tavul byla da viḥor byla jolu anyn da bulut tozɣaɣy bujruḥlarynyn.
Üŕakĺańśa t́eńgiźd́a da qur utadyr any da bar ol öźańĺar qurujdyr kesilir Bašan da Karḿeĺ da japraɣy Ĺevanonnun kesilir.
Tav- lar qaltrarlar andan da ol qajalar irirĺar da ḱot́uŕuĺur ol jer alnyn- dan da dunja da bar olturuvčulary anda.

Alnynda ačuvunun kim tura-
dyr da kim toḥtajalyr qabunɣanda ačuvu qaḥyry janar ot kibik da ol qajalar v́eŕań bolurlar andan.
Jaḥšydyr H kiplikḱa tar ḱuńd́a da śuv́adir išanuvčularny anar.
Da tašḥyn byla ašar t́uǵaĺ tavusulmaḥ qylar ornun- dan da dušmanlaryn quvar qaranɣyda.
Ńe saɣyš ėt́asiź Adonaj üč́uń tavusulmaḥ ol qyladyr turmastyr ėki forlar bundi tarlyḥ.
Ki bolɣanlary üč́uń butaḥlanɣanlar t́eǵańakĺar kibik da ič́ḱańĺar ėsirikĺar kibik kep keńa- t́a ört́alirĺar qura kibik qurur kesiĺḿakt́ań.

Śeńd́ań čyḥty saɣyš
ėt́uv́č́u H üśt́uńa jamanny bajtbaḥ keńaš́.
Bolej ajtty H ėger baz bolsalar da ḱop bolsalar alejda kesilirĺar da ašar ḱuč́ĺari da qyjnama qyjna- maslar artyḥ śeni.
Da haĺegińa syndyryrmyn bojunsasyn üśt́ujd́ań da bavlaryjny üźarmiń.
Da symarlar üśt́uja H urluḥ ėtiĺḿaś šemijd́ań artyḥ ju- v́uńd́ań abaɣyjnyn ėksitirmiń jonɣan abaḥny da qujɣan abaḥny qojarmyn źeŕatij qatyna ki jeńgiĺ bolduj.

app.note: F305-90: spelled quratadyr; a scribal error.
F305-90: spelled turaryr; a scribal error.
